name: Elaine M. Huang
content: Elaine M. Huang, Ph.D. | Department of Informatics | UZH Skip navigation Elaine M. Huang, Ph.D. Elaine M. Huang Associate Professor Department of Informatics University of Zurich Binzmühlestrasse 14 CH-8050 Zürich Room BIN 2.B.06 Tel +41 44 63 54411 Fax +41 44 63 56809 Email huang@ifi.uzh.ch Elaine M. Huang is an Associate Professor of Human-Computer Interaction at UZH and head of the People and Computing Lab at the Department of Informatics. She joined UZH in September 2010. Previously, she held positions as an Assistant Professor at the University of Calgary, Canada and as a Senior Staff Research Scientist at Motorola Labs, USA. She received her Ph.D. in Computer Science from the Georgia Institute of Technology in 2006. CV huang-cv-24.06.2011 (PDF, 199 KB) Publications Additional Information Title Teaser text Zum UZH Portal
